statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE sender_wallet_address = '123abc'
SELECT receiver_wallet_address, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC
SELECT sender_wallet_address, receiver_wallet_address FROM transaction_history WHERE sender_wallet_address = '456def'
SELECT AVG(amount) FROM transaction_history
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE sender_wallet_address = 'address123' AND amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_wallet_address, receiver_wallet_address FROM transaction_history WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT sender_wallet_address, receiver_wallet_address, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_history GROUP BY sender_wallet_address, receiver_wallet_address;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, from_account_id, to_account_id, amount, timestamp FROM transaction_history WHERE from_account_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM account_balances WHERE balance > 5000 ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount) FROM transaction_history;
SELECT account_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM account_balances GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT th.transaction_id, th.amount, ab.balance FROM transaction_history th JOIN account_balances ab ON th.from_account_id = ab.account_id WHERE th.amount < ab.balance ORDER BY th.amount DESC;

SELECT th.transaction_id, th.amount, th.timestamp, ab.balance FROM transaction_history th JOIN account_balances ab ON th.from_account_id = ab.account_id WHERE th.amount > ab.balance ORDER BY th.timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM transaction_history;
SELECT * FROM transactions LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, previous_block_hash FROM blocks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE account_name LIKE '%Savings%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE sender_id = 'ad74b387-89ca-4e25-a9a7-fcba3a3b0f5d';
SELECT block_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM blocks WHERE previous_block_hash IS NULL;
SELECT account_id, account_name, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC, account_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT * FROM balances WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT block_id, block_hash FROM blockchain;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE sender_id = 123 OR receiver_id = 456;
SELECT t.transaction_id, u.username, b.balance FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.sender_id = u.user_id JOIN balances b ON t.sender_id = b.user_id WHERE b.balance > 5000;
SELECT u.username, b.balance FROM users u JOIN balances b ON u.user_id = b.user_id ORDER BY b.balance DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT t.transaction_id, u.username AS sender, u2.username AS receiver, t.amount FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.sender_id = u.user_id JOIN users u2 ON t.receiver_id = u2.user_id WHERE t.amount < 1000;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_name, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT status_message, status_date FROM transaction_status ORDER BY status_date DESC;
SELECT block_hash, mining_date FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT user_name, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance < 500;
SELECT th.transaction_id, th.sender_address, th.amount, ts.status_message FROM transaction_history th JOIN transaction_status ts ON th.transaction_id = ts.transaction_id;
SELECT ta.user_name, ta.account_balance, tf.fee_amount, tf.fee_date FROM user_accounts ta LEFT JOIN transaction_fees tf ON ta.account_id = tf.transaction_id;

SELECT th.transaction_id, th.sender_address, th.receiver_address, td.block_hash FROM transaction_history th JOIN blockchain_data td ON th.transaction_id = td.transaction_id ORDER BY th.transaction_date DESC;
